questions.question: The highest Test partnership for any wicket is over 600 runs.
Mahela Jayawardene and Kumar Sangakkara hold the record for highest ODI partnership.
The highest opening partnership in Test cricket is held by an Indian pair.
Chris Gayle and Marlon Samuels hold the record for highest T20I partnership.
The record 10th wicket partnership in Tests is over 200 runs.
Sourav Ganguly and Rahul Dravid have the highest 3rd wicket partnership in ODIs.
The highest partnership in World Cup history is over 350 runs.
Allan Border and Dean Jones hold an Australian partnership record.
The highest partnership for the 6th wicket in Tests is held by a Pakistani pair.
No partnership in international cricket has ever lasted more than a full day's play.
